title: The Rockets From Hamas, And The Iron Dome That Could Use Patching
teaser: For more on the rockets now used by Hamas and Hezbollah, Robert Siegel speaks with Ted Postol, a professor of science, technology and national security policy at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. Postol also comments on Israel's pursuit of an upgraded defense system.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
